relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare named a Leader in The Forrester Wave™: Edge Development Platforms, Q4 2023
relatedBlades.subtitle: Cloudflare received top scores in 24 out of 33 criteria for Edge Development Platforms in the Q4 2023 report.
relatedBlades.copy:
Forrester Research, Inc evaluated the most significant vendors in the Edge Development Platform market based on 33-categories including developer experience, security, and pricing flexibility & transparency. 

![Forrester Q423 Wave Graph](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/3cPkHGDq29lw14YPwoKM5t/177e84cc912210547c99282eec353ea4/Wave_graph_15_.png)

relatedBlades.htmlContent:
Source: The Forrester Wave™: Edge Development Platforms, Q4 2023

The Forrester Wave™ is copyrighted by Forrester Research, Inc. Forrester and Forrester Wave are trademarks of Forrester Research, Inc. The Forrester Wave is a graphical representation of Forrester's call on a market and is plotted using a detailed spreadsheet with exposed scores, weightings, and comments. Forrester does not endorse any vendor, product, or service depicted in the Forrester Wave. Information is based on best available resources. Opinions reflect judgment at the time and are subject to change.
